Set Up
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(wordcloud)
```


# read in data with initial clean

```{r}
data_raw <- read_csv("survey_data/V5_Community-Based+Success_January+28,+2026_16.54.csv", col_names = FALSE)

# set row 1 to colnames
colnames(data_raw) <- as.character(data_raw[2, ])

#remove rows 1-3
data <- data_raw %>% 
  slice(-c(1:3)) %>% 
  #remove unneccesary columns
  select(-c(1:10))

# save cleaned data
write_csv(data, "survey_data/cleaned_data.csv")

```
